name: CCMMYY
description:
CCMMYY is a puzzle game like sokoban with three characters of different colors: cyan, magenta, and yellow. These three colors never collide with each other, but they can still interact with other combined colors which are red, green, blue, and black.

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Switch Player: X or Space

Undo: Z or U

Reset: R

Back: Esc or B

Update 1

Adjusted levels 5 and 8.
